casebody.data:
STATE of Louisiana v. David Marshall HARMON, Jr. No. 99-KK-1751. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 1, 1999.

Prior report: La.App., — So.2d -.

IN RE: Harmon, David Marshall Jr.;— Defendant(s); Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writ; Parish of Caddo 1st Judicial District Court Div. “B” Number 192,348; to the Court of Appeal, Second Circuit, Number 32,659-KW

Denied. Not timely filed.

 CALOGERO, C.J.,

concurs. State v. Barbier should prompt success for relator on renewal of motion in district court.

KIMBALL, J., not on panel.
